meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the study of aerodynamics.
meanings.sent1: The aerodynamicists conducted experiments to understand how air moves around objects.
meanings.sent2: The team of aerodynamicists worked together to improve the design of the airplane wings.
meanings.sent3: The aerodynamicists joked that they could predict the wind patterns better than the weatherman.
meanings.sent4: She moved through the water like an aerodynamicist, effortlessly gliding through the waves.
meanings.sent5: The aerodynamicists' knowledge of airflow made them invaluable in designing faster cars.

meanings.definition: Those who design vehicles or objects to minimize air resistance.
meanings.sent1: The aerodynamicists created a sleek car that cut through the wind with ease.
meanings.sent2: Automobile companies hire aerodynamicists to make their cars more fuel-efficient.
meanings.sent3: The aerodynamicists playfully argued over whose design would win in a race against the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were so smooth, she seemed like an aerodynamicist of motion.
meanings.sent5: The aerodynamicists' expertise led to the development of faster and more efficient airplanes.
